hero.title: About Him Energy
hero.subtitle: Pioneering renewable energy
hero.description: With over 10 years of experience, we are a trusted partner in developing sustainable energy solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to delivering modern, efficient, and environmentally friendly renewable energy solutions, contributing to building a sustainable future for future generations.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the leading company in renewable energy in Vietnam and Southeast Asia, with the goal of achieving 100% clean energy by 2030.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Always seeking and applying the most advanced technologies

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Commitment to environment and sustainable development

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Ensuring the highest quality in all products and services

timeline.title: Company Founded
timeline.description: Him Energy was established with the mission to develop renewable energy

timeline.title: First Project
timeline.description: Completed first solar power project with 1MW capacity

timeline.title: Service Expansion
timeline.description: Started providing energy consulting services for businesses

timeline.title: New Technology
timeline.description: Applied AI technology in energy system management

timeline.title: Major Achievement
timeline.description: Reached 100MW installed capacity and 500+ completed projects

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Leading experts in renewable energy field
team.description: Our team includes engineers, specialists and scientists with extensive experience in renewable energy.
